After taking a sample of the target's hair with the use of a [[puppet]], the user forms a specific hand seal, and takes control of the target.

== Trivia ==
* [[Ino Yamanaka]] views this technique as a cheap imitation to the [[Yamanaka clan]]'s hiden techniques.
* The hand seal of this technique is similar to the [[Mind Body Disturbance Technique]].
